name: Fable Wars
description:
Traverse the enchanted forest in Fable Wars unique take on a card puzzle RPG game. Put together a team of fable heroes and save the fantasy world by defeating the enemies in a series of thrilling puzzle quests. Build your card collection and assemble a team of legendary heroes!

- Make your way through fantasy puzzle battles with a unique, easy-to-learn mechanic and thrilling challenges!
- Summon hundreds of powerful fairy tale heroes!
- Create a team of heroes and build your magic card deck!
- Level up your heroes and develop their special powers!
- Create unique and powerful items to strengthen your hero card collection!
- Fight against players around the world in epic PVP battles!
- Face thrilling boss battles. Adapt your tactics and win RPG card battles for even more loot!
- Learn more about the legendary heroes of Fable Wars, send them out on missions and expeditions, and gather fantastic loot!
- Match against your friends and other players in daily, weekly, monthly, and exclusive events!
- Open idle chests, battle enemies, and gather legendary items!
- Experience the thrills and joys of building a CCG deck, collect magic hero cards and devise best ways to win!
- Explore the amazing fairy tale world and make it your own! Discover the unique spin on well-known heroes, face detailed monsters, and immerse yourself in a majestic world of Fable Wars!

Dive into the world that combines a puzzle battler and an RPG with the fantastical realm of fable heroes. Build up your team, clear card battles, and become the hero the enchanted forest needs. Don’t hesitate, join Fable Wars today!

Please note that although Fable Wars is free to play, our users are able to purchase virtual items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
